title: Rep. David Price (D-NC), The Congressional Experience
description:
From his perspective as a longtime member of Congress and a political scientist, Rep. David Price (D-NC) discusses the rules and role of Congress, how it is changed over time and how the legislative body can function better. He's interviewed by Rep. Gerald Connolly (D-VA).  
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
